data.text:
Summer time means a look ahead to next season!

Each week moving forward, we will preview at least one conference in college basketball from soup to nuts.

Check below for today’s breakdown on the SEC.

SEC Preseason Power Rankings

1. Alabama

Projected Starting 5:

G Mark Sears

G Chris Youngblood

G Latrell Wrightsell

F Grant Nelson

C Cliff Omoruyi

Projected Bench: Derrion Reid, Mouhamed Dioubate, Aidan Sherrell, Naas Cunningham, Houston Mallette, Aden Holloway, Labaron Philon, Jarin Stevenson

Key Newcomers: Derrion Reid, Aidan Sherrell, Naas Cunningham, Houston Mallette (Pepperdine), Chris Youngblood (South Florida), Aden Holloway (Auburn), Labaron Philon, Cliff Omoruyi (Rutgers)

Key Losses: Aaron Estrada, Rylan Griffen, Nick Pringle

2. Arkansas

Projected Starting 5:

G Boogie Fland

G D.J. Wagner

G Johnell Davis

F Trevon Brazile

C Jonas Aidoo

Projected Bench: Zvonimir Ivisic, Billy Richmond, Karter Knox, Adou Thiero, Cash Chavis

Key Newcomers: Johnell Davis (Florida Atlantic), Jonas Aidoo (Tennessee), Zvonimir Ivisic (Kentucky), Boogie Fland, Billy Richmond, Karter Knox, Adou Thiero (Kentucky), D.J. Wagner (Kentucky), Cash Chavis

Key Losses: Tramon Mark, Khalif Battle

3. Auburn

Projected Starting 5:

G JP Pegues

G Denver Jones

F Chaney Johnson

F Johni Broome

Projected Bench: Jahki Howard, Tahaad Pettiford, Dylan Cardwell, CJ Williams, Ja’Heim Hudson, Chris Moore, Chad Baker-Mazara

Key Newcomers: Tahaad Pettiford, Jahki Howard, JP Pegues (Furman), Ja’Heim Hudson (SMU), Miles Kelly (Georgia Tech)

Key Losses: Jaylin Williams, Lior Berman, K.D. Johnson, Tre Donaldson, Aden Holloway

Key Newcomers: Andre Mills, George Turkson, CJ Wilcher (Nebraska), Pharrel Payne (Texas A&M), Zhuric Phelps (SMU)

Key Losses: Tyrece Radford, Wildens Leveque, Eli Lawrence

5. Florida
